content: **knitted socks for men in drops fabel sizes 38 - 46 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-491 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 38/40 - 41/43 44/46 foot length 24-27-30 cm leg length 20-21-22 cm heel height 6-7-7 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-150 g colour 115 light grey drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge ** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
